Major_Arcs.title: The Ghost Town and its Fate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the setting and central conflict concerning the fate of Ghost Town and the emotional reactions of the characters.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction
sub_scenes.description: The story begins with the title panel and introduces the initial setting and characters.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Girl from Ghost Town

sub_scenes.title: Ghost Town's Impending Demise
sub_scenes.description: The characters move to Ghost Town, and the central conflict of its demolition for an airport is revealed.

narrative_arcs.title: Saloon Exit and Ghost Town Ride
Ghost Town's Past and Airport Future

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Reactions and Flashback
sub_scenes.description: The emotional impact of Ghost Town's demolition is explored, including personal connections and a flashback to its past.

narrative_arcs.title: Emotional Argument about Ghost Town's Demolition

Major_Arcs.title: Family Business, Romantic Tensions, and Resolve
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on family business conflicts related to the airport, Nan's romantic relationship with Cal, and her emotional journey.

sub_scenes.title: Family and Business Disputes
sub_scenes.description: Business discussions intertwine with family arguments and Nan's resistance to her father's expectations regarding the airport project.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Comfort and Clarity in Romance
sub_scenes.description: Nan seeks advice and comfort regarding her relationship with Cal, leading to her resolve to confront him.

narrative_arcs.title: Maid's Pragmatic View on Love and Action

sub_scenes.title: Horseback Confrontation and Contract
sub_scenes.description: Nan confronts Cal on horseback, leading to discussions about the airport deadline and a pre-existing contract.

Major_Arcs.title: Snowstorm and Reconciliation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the sudden onset of a severe snowstorm, the community's reaction, and the reconciliation between Nan and Cal amidst the crisis.

sub_scenes.title: Reconciliation and Weather Warning
sub_scenes.description: Nan and Cal reconcile as the severity of an approaching snowstorm becomes apparent.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan and Cal's Reconciliation and Understanding
Mr. Wills and Son Assess the Snowstorm's Severity

sub_scenes.title: Growing Concern and Ominous Forecast
sub_scenes.description: The community grapples with the implications of the worsening snowstorm, fearing for their livestock and livelihood.

narrative_arcs.title: Grave Concerns about Livestock and Fodder
Confirmation of the Weather's Unprecedented Danger
Seeking Comfort and Hope Amidst Hardship
Cal's Ominous Reflection on Impending Starvation and Future Uncertainty

sub_scenes.title: Facing the Crisis and Hope from Above
sub_scenes.description: Amidst despair, the community finds a glimmer of hope and experiences relief with the arrival of aid.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Doubt and Cal's Reassurance in the Face of Crisis
Nan's Mother's Plea for Rest and Hope Amidst Overwhelming Odds
Cal's Restless Night and the Unrelenting Snow
Despair and Weariness in the Face of Endless Winter
Sound of an Airplane and a Glimmer of Hope
Excitement and Realization of Fodder Drop
Conversation on Romance Amidst Crisis and Relief

Major_Arcs.title: Introducing Chane Benson: The Cowtown Casanova
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts the narrative to a new setting and introduces Chane Benson, focusing on his character and initial impressions from the townspeople.

sub_scenes.title: Chane Benson's Debut and Bystander Reactions
sub_scenes.description: Chane Benson is introduced in a dramatic town scene, and the reactions of various townspeople provide different perspectives on his character.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Chane Benson and a Town Scene
Reactions and Judgments of Bystanders on Chane Benson's Actions
Further Reactions and Cynical Commentary on Chane Benson

Major_Arcs.title: Moral Concerns and Tensions around Jeff and Chane
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the concerns surrounding Jeff's admiration for potentially dangerous figures and introduces moral comparisons and rising tensions.

sub_scenes.title: Mother's Worries and Moral Guidance
sub_scenes.description: The mother expresses her concerns about Jeff's fascination with violence and attempts to guide him towards more virtuous role models.

narrative_arcs.title: Mother's Flashback and Concerns About Jeff

sub_scenes.title: Clyde and Chane's Macho Banter
sub_scenes.description: Clyde and Chane engage in a tense, seemingly jovial conversation with underlying violent undertones, contrasting with the mother's moral concerns.

narrative_arcs.title: Macho Banter and Violent Undertones between Clyde and Chane

Major_Arcs.title: Sally and Clyde's Concern for Jeff
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Sally and Clyde's shared concern for Jeff and their contrasting approaches to helping him.

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Worry and Clyde's Initial Dismissal
sub_scenes.description: Sally expresses deep concern about Jeff's behavior, while Clyde initially attempts to downplay the situation.

narrative_arcs.title: Clyde's Affectionate Agreement and Future Vision

sub_scenes.title: Seeking External Advice
sub_scenes.description: Sally and Clyde decide to seek advice, leading Sally to Mr. Benson.

narrative_arcs.title: Narrator's Observation of Jeff's Absence and Town Ride
Sally Seeks Advice from Mr. Benson
Mr. Benson's Advice on Violence and Youth

Major_Arcs.title: Newspaper Conflict and Benson's Plan
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a conflict related to a newspaper article and Benson's plan to address it, involving Sally and Clyde (the editor).

sub_scenes.title: Article Outrage and Clyde's Dismissiveness
sub_scenes.description: Sally is outraged by a newspaper article and confronts Clyde, the editor, about it, but finds him dismissive.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Outrage Over the Article and Initial Talk with Benson
Sally Confronts Clyde, the Editor, About the Article
Clyde's Dismissive Reaction and Sally's Criticism

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Benson's Guidance in Juniper
sub_scenes.description: Disappointed with Clyde's response, Sally seeks Benson's guidance in Juniper.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally Seeks Benson's Guidance in Juniper

sub_scenes.title: Article's Impact and Dinner Invitation
sub_scenes.description: Jeff reacts to the newspaper article, and a dinner invitation is considered as part of a plan.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Reaction to the Article and Speculation on Clyde's Response
Considering Dinner with Chane and Reflecting on His Character

Major_Arcs.title: Dinner Party and Violent Climax
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the dinner party with Chane, leading to escalating tensions, a physical confrontation, and a forced kiss.

sub_scenes.title: Rising Tension at Dinner
sub_scenes.description: A post-dinner conversation leads to misunderstandings and rising tension between the characters.

narrative_arcs.title: Post-Dinner Moonlight Conversation and Rising Tension

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and the Ride to Town
sub_scenes.description: The immediate aftermath of the violent encounter leads to explanations and a realization of danger to Clyde, prompting a rescue mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Immediate Aftermath and Explanations Following the Forced Kiss
Realization of Danger to Clyde and Urgent Need to Go to Town
Jeff's Determined Ride to Save Clyde
Confrontation in Town and Jeff's Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: Showdown and Resolution in the Clarion Office
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the showdown in town and the subsequent anxious wait and relief in the Clarion office.

sub_scenes.title: From Gunfight to Fistfight
sub_scenes.description: The potential gunfight is de-escalated into a fistfight, leading to a physical showdown.

narrative_arcs.title: Escalating Tensions and a Challenge to a Fistfight

sub_scenes.title: Anxious Waiting and Relief
sub_scenes.description: The anxious wait in the Clarion office for news of the fight's outcome, followed by relief and positive reflections.

narrative_arcs.title: Anxious Wait in the Clarion Office
Recounting the Night's Events and Newspaper Priority
Praise for Jeff and Clyde's Character and Family Values

Major_Arcs.title: New Boss and Budding Romance at the Ranch
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new boss at the ranch, Steve Daley, and the beginning of a romantic relationship with Betsy amidst ranch troubles.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Steve Daley and Initial Tensions
sub_scenes.description: Steve Daley's arrival as the new boss creates initial tensions and uncertainties at the ranch.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of the New Boss, Steve Daley
Settling Steve In and Past Doubts
Ranch Troubles and Range War Fear

sub_scenes.title: Trip to Town and Rising Conflict
sub_scenes.description: A trip to town leads to a confrontation and Steve's intervention to protect Betsy.

narrative_arcs.title: Trip to Town and Hank's Orders for Dress Material

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Realization and Confession
sub_scenes.description: Betsy has a romantic realization and confesses her feelings to Steve, leading to a promise and a kiss.

Major_Arcs.title: Conflicts and Departure - Betsy and Steve
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details new conflicts arising after Betsy and Steve's romance blossoms, leading to Steve's departure despite Betsy's pleas.

sub_scenes.title: New Conflicts and Steve's Defense
sub_scenes.description: New conflicts arise, leading to confrontations and Steve's need to defend himself.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Hank and Steve's Defense
Justification for Arms and Recall of Ambush

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Plea and Steve's Departure
sub_scenes.description: Betsy's distress and plea against violence, but Steve remains resolute and departs.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Narration of Pursuit and Arrival at Devil's Pass

Major_Arcs.title: Devil's Pass and Romantic Climax - Steve and Betsy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the Steve and Betsy storyline with a confrontation at Devil's Pass and a romantic resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Threat at Devil's Pass
sub_scenes.description: Steve faces a dangerous confrontation and capture at Devil's Pass.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Capture at Devil's Pass

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Reassurance and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Despite danger, Betsy and Steve find romantic reassurance and devotion.

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie, Dave, and Fred - Deception and Breakup
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the complex relationship between Carrie, Dave, and Fred, marked by deception and emotional turmoil.

sub_scenes.title: Initial Conflict and Troubled Signs
sub_scenes.description: Initial tensions and signs of trouble emerge in the relationships between Betsy, Dave and ranch concerns.

narrative_arcs.title: Curley's Troubled Behavior and Ranch Concerns

sub_scenes.title: Fence Dispute and Violent Escalation
sub_scenes.description: A fence dispute escalates into a violent confrontation, revealing deeper conflicts and tensions.

sub_scenes.title: Apology and Lingering Tensions
sub_scenes.description: An apology is offered, but differing opinions and lingering tensions remain, foreshadowing future conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussion of Fred and Differing Opinions
Agreement to Avoid Conflict and Carrie's Reflection
Encounter with Fred Gordon and Ominous Question

sub_scenes.title: Misunderstandings and Proposals
sub_scenes.description: Misunderstandings and confrontations intertwine with unexpected romantic developments and a marriage proposal.

narrative_arcs.title: Miss Bronson and Mr. Gordon's Conversation about Dave's Feelings

sub_scenes.title: Deception Revealed and Emotional Fallout
sub_scenes.description: Deception is revealed regarding the Carlton contract, leading to fury, confrontation, and emotional aftermath.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations and Assertions in Carlton's Office

Major_Arcs.title: Breakup and Reconciliation - Carrie and Fred
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the emotional breakup between Carrie and Fred, followed by a partial reconciliation and ultimately a romantic climax.

sub_scenes.title: Separation and Lingering Feelings
sub_scenes.description: Carrie reflects on her hurt and pride, leading to a cold dismissal of Dave and suppressed emotions.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflecting on Past Pride and Present Hurt with Fred
Unexpected Encounter and Cold Dismissal in Town
Concern and Defiance in the Buckboard

sub_scenes.title: Truth Revealed and Romantic Climax
sub_scenes.description: The truth about the contract is revealed, leading to a romantic climax and reconciliation between Carrie and Fred.

narrative_arcs.title: Father and Dave's Clarification & Carlton's Interjection
Dave's Confession and Carrie's Ride to Fred

Major_Arcs.title: Chris and Dirk - Danger, Escape, and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the dangerous situation of Chris and Dirk, their attempted escape, and the ultimate betrayal and deception.

sub_scenes.title: Dirk's Urgent Arrival and Injury Assessment
sub_scenes.description: Dirk arrives injured and seeks help from Chris, leading to a doctor's examination and confirmation of his gunshot wound.

narrative_arcs.title: Late Night Visitor and Urgent Plea

sub_scenes.title: Family Concern and Marshal's Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: Dirk's family expresses concern, and the Marshal initiates an inquiry, leading to a confrontation at the ranch.

narrative_arcs.title: Worried Kin and a Father's Decision

sub_scenes.title: Marshal's Interrogation and Escape Plan
sub_scenes.description: The Marshal interrogates Chris and Dirk, but Chris pleads for mercy, leading to a change of plans and a subtle hint of escape.

narrative_arcs.title: Plea for Mercy and a Change of Plans
Duty vs. Love and a Hint of Escape
Decision to Act and Arming Dirk

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Pursuit, and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: The escape attempt leads to pursuit, a gunfight, and ultimately a shocking betrayal.

Major_Arcs.title: Recovery and Wedding - Chris and Rance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the Chris and Rance storyline with Rance's recovery and their wedding, resolving their romantic arc.

sub_scenes.title: Rance's Recovery and Romantic Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Rance recovers, and amidst concern and reassurance, a marriage proposal is made and accepted.

sub_scenes.title: Wedding Preparations and Dirk's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Wedding preparations are underway, but ominous foreshadowing and Dirk's unexpected arrival create suspense.
